mapper.select: select i.id, p.name as positionName, c.nickname as companyNickname, p.job_place, i.status from t_interview as i join t_resume_delivery as rd on i.rd_id = rd.id join t_position as p on rd.position_id = p.id join t_company as c on p.company_id = c.id where i.user_id = #{userId}

select iv.id,iv.user_id,i.name,i.phone,i.email,i.address,p.name as positionName,iv.status from t_interview as iv join t_resume_delivery as rd on iv.rd_id = rd.id join t_info as i on iv.user_id = i.user_id join t_position as p on rd.position_id = p.id join t_company as c on p.company_id = c.id
and p.name = concat('%',#{positionName},'%')
and rd.status = #{status}
and c.id = #{companyId} and rd.is_deleted = 0
